    • Uses of avcodec.AVHWAccel in org.bytedeco.javacpp

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      avcodec.AVHWAccel avcodec.AVHWAccel.alloc_frame(avcodec.AVHWAccel.Alloc_frame_AVCodecContext_AVFrame alloc_frame) 
      static avcodec.AVHWAccel avcodec.av_hwaccel_next(avcodec.AVHWAccel hwaccel)
      If hwaccel is NULL, returns the first registered hardware accelerator, if hwaccel is non-NULL, returns the next registered hardware accelerator after hwaccel, or NULL if hwaccel is the last one.
